website_summaries.verdict: The Australian Gold tanning oil supplies your skin with natural vitamins and moisturizing nutrients for the darkest tan you can get.
pros: Spray gel unlocks your body's tanning ability
Contains vitamins A and E and Australian oils
Self-acting bronzer provides an immediate, golden brown color
Skin will feel smooth and silky
cons: There is added bronzer to it

customer_reviews.title: Edward to Jacob in 1 week!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think I’ve ever tanned so fast in my life. I spend months in the sun every spring summer and fall and can never quite get that dark Mediterranean tan that I’ve always longed for. I decided to give this a try for my evenings of sitting out in the sun with a brew, and in less than a week I noticed that my skin retained much more of the color I was hoping for. I will say, it IS an oil NOT a lotion, so don’t be surprised when you spray it on, sweat, and all of a sudden are slipperier than Shamoo in a car wash.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew and Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Smells sooo good. This outdoor tanning oil has carrot extract formula but it doesn’t turn orange at all. It says DARK TANNING OUL on the bottle But it actually doesn’t make your tan too dark tho. It gives you a nice bronze tan. Ill order again. I took many pictures after a week of using this product. You can see them on my instagram @niloumakeup
customer_reviews.author: Nilou Fard

customer_reviews.title: Shipped stupidly.
customer_reviews.text: Just a heads up Amazon ships these things all stupid. They basically toss it into a ziploc bag, so going through transit the spray nozzle goes off however many dozens of times. So when it arrives at your house you have your lotion in a bag submerged in an ounce of liquid. Pretty shoddy.
customer_reviews.author: John G Marks II

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell!! It’s gives so much color and not the gross orangey look. It goes on nice and evenly and very easy and the smell is just amazing! Like an orangey scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greasy but eventually gets the job done...
customer_reviews.text: It does give you a nice tan, but definitely not as quickly as I thought it would. It's pretty greasy so anytime I use it I need to shower before going out because I look slick and sweaty, and I don't want it to get on my clothing, in my hair, or near my face. The scent isn't necessarily good or bad, but not great, so that is a little disappointing. Doesn't specify that it can or cannot be used while indoor tanning, but I wouldn't risk getting grease all over the tanning bed.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Brulé

customer_reviews.title: Its a good tanning oil
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot, its pretty natural. I actually mix it with some other ingredients that I like and helps get me super dark fast. I'm always careful with oils so they dont break me out, but this doesn't cause any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: COUNTERFEIT! Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this and used it at the beach. Neither of us ever burn and if we do it’s on our shoulders where the sun hits the most. We were extremely burned on EVERY part of our body that the sun touched. We were on the beach for one day. Our skin has peeled for a week straight and now our skin is extremely dry, scaled and drastically discolored.
customer_reviews.author: Jana M.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff to put on after sunscreen, it does accelerate your tan. Although I wish I had read a little bit more in the description. This product doesn’t have an spf so you basically just cook in the sun without sunscreen. The spray nozzle is more of a direct shot than a mist but that’s not a huge problem because you can just rub it in. Not disappointed in the product. More myself for not doing my research
customer_reviews.author: Nick C.

customer_reviews.title: Every other Day
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely Love this product. I haven’t been able to get much of a tan. But just a few times using this look at me now!! I also used third spf 4 before spraying this to protect my skin. Leaves you feeling soft & prevents drying of the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Aucoin

customer_reviews.title: Smell isn't bad... but I've used other products with better smells!
customer_reviews.text: Tanned well with this and skin did not burn or blister/peel. Felt like normal tanning spray and did its job. The ONLY thing was the smell, it smelt almost too artificial? Like more of a "it smells okay, but you can tell they tried really hard to make it smell great but kind of failed" smell? Idk, it just doesn't smell too natural to me lol but it works just fine! It wasn't bad and you really can't even smell it when after you put it on. It's when I opened the bottle directly and put my nose up to the opening to sniff it. I kind of wished I got another product for a cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: i just receved today ad thank god it is a sunny day, i was super excited and put it on and sat in the sun for about 3 hours. the tan line was there for a while, but it wasnt as good as expected because i thought it would give me a better and golden tan. might have to put more to actually have it work
customer_reviews.author: esther

customer_reviews.title: Good for the cost*
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I had an allergic reaction to the oil, as in my entire body was covered in hives. However that doesn’t mean you will, I tried it on my s/o and he didn’t have any issues with it at all. Very moisturizing but NOT clog your pores oily. I did have an issue with the scent, it was very unnatural in my opinion, but also not over bearing to the point where I COULDNT stand it. Overall I think it’s just ok, it gets the job done. I would be careful if you tend to have allergies towards lotions/sunscreens this contains dihydroxyacetone which is a common allergent.
customer_reviews.author: Sachi Barker

customer_reviews.title: Loved this oil
customer_reviews.text: I was in bad need of some extra color after living in Dublin, Ireland for the year and this did just the trick. I applied on top of my normal sun screen and immediately loved the scent and smell of it. For sure helped with my overall color, was very pleased with the purchase and will look to this product again in the future when I finally get some sun again!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Best Tanning Oil Ever
customer_reviews.text: Australian Gold is the BEST! I couldn't be happier that I bought this product! I usually tan pretty dark, but I wanted a jumpstart this season, since I haven't been able to go to the beach or pool due to covid. I used this tanning oil and the first day I retained a decent amount of color and am a solid two shades darker than before I used it. It has a light bronzer, but it just adds a nice boost to the color. This product won't turn your hands orange when you apply it, so you don't need gloves. It smells amazing too. I highly recommend this product. I will absolutely be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Smells good and moisturizing.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for running in the spring to put on my arms and legs to get a little color and moisturize my skin while soaking up a little Vitamin D. Growing up my parents owned a tanning salon so I appreciate the smell of the oil. It’s just like the AG tanning lotion. This dry oil soaks into your skin fast and does not leave you sticky or a filmy residue. I have sensitive skin (skin type 2) and this does not irritate my skin at all. I do not put it on my face.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rae

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed using this a bit. I spend a lot of time outdoors and wanted something to help me get my skin to start tanning again versus burning like it has been. I tried this and it helped! I'm back to where I was as a kid and being able to tan, without burning. It smells fairly decent just make sure you shower after, it gets feeling super gross on skin after a little bit and leaves an odd smell on clothes.
customer_reviews.author: SJensen

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING smell
customer_reviews.text: This spray smells soooo good. I put it on whenever I'm working outside, and it definitely lends a little extra glow to me. It's a very subtle effect, just enough to make my skin look a little sun kissed. It is very oily, so make sure you're planning on showering afterwards, and if you're out working in the garden like me, be prepared for dirt to get stuck to you! It's great for the pool too.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Morgin

customer_reviews.title: Seems Fake!
customer_reviews.text: I'd read some negative reviews on this item before buying but thought it was just "picky" people. Now I realize I was wrong. Product came without a cap and the sprayer seems faulty. Not the quality you would expect from a renowned brand like Australian Gold. Recently saw the Netflix documentary "Broken", there's an episode on fake cosmetics made in China by counterfeit manufacturers who replace key components in products and expose consumers to potential hazardous chemicals only to obtain a profit. Watch your health, save your money, don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Gaston Waldman Lovardo

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: This product appears to be either old or fake it has no odor and it is very tacky feeling and turns white when applying to skin I have this product and it does not compare to these that I ordered! Skin feels sticky until washed off and very little tint for bronzer
customer_reviews.author: LJR

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: saw a noticeable difference with the first application. The hardest parts to tan evenly is my biceps and legs. Now I believe I will achieve the level of darkness with one 8oz bottle. I tan 3 times a week in a vertical booth for 9 minutes per session. I do recommend this as a faster way to achieve the look you desire. Love that it is non oily.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Allen

customer_reviews.title: Lid was off , not happy :/
customer_reviews.text: Sad , The lid was off and even leaked out the bag it was wrapped in .lost a good bit of it . Good thing my other items was wrapped up good . Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: daniel j spencer jr

customer_reviews.title: No safety seal, or even a cap.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived without a seal, cannot use the item without verification that it has not been tampered with. Didn't even come with the cap so the entire bottle was basically not usable.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Hammond

customer_reviews.title: I used it three times and the pump quit working.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered on May 4 2019 and finally got to use it when the sun finally showed in Michigan. I used it 3 different sunny days in June and the pump quit working. I love but now it's defective. It's beyond the time now to have it replaced. Hence the reason for my comments.
customer_reviews.author: Babag

customer_reviews.title: Smells INCREDIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe how good this oil is. It smells exactly like the white mystery flavor dum dum sucker - if you know you know! I laid out in the sun in April (in Georgia) for about 3 hours and it gave me a TAN wow. Pretty dark tan lines, I'm impressed. Will definitely order again when I run low.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fair tone skined, slight tan already, 2nd use burned
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice sunscreen. First impressions, amazing smell, It’s amazing and reminds me of coconuts, if that’s what it is lol. But I’m very fair skinned, first impressions applys nicely.Got a slight tan just from being outside for 30 minutes with it, it’s the darkest I’ve been besides sunburn, but It is oily feeling it it’s not bad, I will update once I use it more. Update: stayed outside for 1 hour with this on and I burned, no sight of a tan, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Doubles as a great moisturizer with dark tanning benefits!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Smells good and moisturizes. I use it as a tanning oil and a after shower oil. It contains aloe so it works pretty good on sunburns too. I use it everyday as a moisturizer right when I get out the shower. I’ve spent a lot of money on moisturizers and tanning oil in the past but now all I need is this one. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: NOT REAL..
customer_reviews.text: This absolutely is not AUSTRALIAN GOLD.. I have the same product from Wal Mart to compare and this one is clearer, smells worse, little more liquidity and just does not match up. I didnt even give the product a chance since it was fraudulent I didn't want to risk it.
customer_reviews.author: Will West

customer_reviews.title: This does not tan at all
customer_reviews.text: If you want skin as smooth as a baby's butt, and just as white, go ahead and use this product. I used multiple times thinking that I wasn't putting it on correctly, but to no avail. You'll pay a bit more for a product that actually works, but it's worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dries Out Too Quickly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this oil along with the Exotic Moisturizing Oil. I've now tried them both now, and I'm disappointed with this product. It doesn't stay on, and it dries out on my skin too quickly. I'm just glad I didn't pay a lot for it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Johnson Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing!!! I can tan but I get more of a yellowish tan and this gave me a nice brown tan which I’ve been looking for and couldn’t ever find anything that met my satisfaction and this stuff did the trick! Also smells amazing I will be definitely purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus loves YOU.........

customer_reviews.title: Got that beach tan!
customer_reviews.text: I've got that beautiful brown beach tan going on without even going to the beach. Using this product has given me a darker tan then I could have imagined. This is my go to oil now. I won't be using anything else. I love the spray bottle and the way it smells.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Eh.....
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't what I thought it was. States "dry oil" but it's a white lotion and doesn't rub in well. Was expecting the oil to be shiny on your skin with moisturizers but, its dry and dull on your skin. Don't like how it rubs in either. No sunscreen protection in it either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for bronzing your skin
customer_reviews.text: This product will bring out the golden bronze in your skin when you are tanning. It is not very thick as it is a spray on oil and need to be thin to spray out of the bottle. Love the scent and the way it makes my skin feel.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D'Amore

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Just remember this spray has no SPF. I didn't notice much of a scent. You wont smell like a coconut. Sprays on easy. I was only in the sun for about 1 hour and that was enough for a burn. But I usually tan after I burn a little.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B. Helsel

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I've tried A TON of tanning products and this has worked the best! It smells nice and leaves my skin feeling soft, not greasy after use. I've found if I let it set in for a good 15 minutes then get my sun exposure, that I tan better. I'm fair skinned and usually burn but with slow, carefull exposure, I have a nice tan that I haven't had in years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product was leaking inside the bag
customer_reviews.text: C'mon guys, learn how to ship this so it doesn't come with leaked product all over the inside of the bag when I open it. You're letting ineptitude skew the rating of the product before I even get to use the product
customer_reviews.author: Swoopy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BRONZER
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE I usually turn copper-ish when I tan. But I used this and I was a NICE BRONZY COLOR My friend had her own tanning oil and ended up using mine because she loved my tan!
customer_reviews.author: mera yang

customer_reviews.title: Always a favorite
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and leaves your skin super soft after you wash it off. Anything with carrot extract is a winner in my book! Sites exactly what it's supposed to, I always feel much more tan after use.
customer_reviews.author: TippyReviews

customer_reviews.title: A Tanning Oil That Doesn't Reek
customer_reviews.text: The package came sealed in a plastic bag, no tampering. It comes with a pump where you can control the amount of oil you want to use on yourself. The consistency is perfect not too greasy, it goes on well and smells good and doesn't give off the 'fake tan' smell. I've been using it once a day for an hour in the sun paired with sunscreen and still managed to develop color. Keeps your skin moisturized and soft for long periods of time until you need to shower.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: My skin doesn’t look oil at all. I actually don’t mind oily skin but this is a great product. It had a little color which looks great on my fair skin. I use sunscreen on all of my body except my legs, and I use this on my legs. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try it’s great
customer_reviews.text: A bottle of this lasts me practically though the whole summer.I tan a lot and absolutely love this stuff.Ive been using it for yrs and I have 0 complaints.Theres really no sent and it’s easy to rub on.The part I hate it having to wash my hands after lol but I’ll just get a glove.But yeah no complaints here
customer_reviews.author: Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: It's not like the old oil that smelt so good. It's fine, does it work, we can't tell. Has a decent smell, but just ok. We will probably buy again just because not much else out there.
customer_reviews.author: Fishstick

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, works very well and I love that it's not oily. I also have sensitive skin, and this causes no issues like many other products. Looking forward to a good tanning season this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Case Garvey

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD FOR BRASILIAN BRUNETS
customer_reviews.text: THIS OIL MADE ME RED INSTEAD OF BROWN ! NOT GOOD FOR BRUNETS IS A OIL FOR WHITE PEOPLE ONLY . THE HAWAIAN TOPIC THAT I USE FOR YEARS WAS GIVEN ME A NICE DARK BROWN BUT WHEN I USED THIS AUSTRALIAN OIL FOR FIRST TIME , IT MADE THE BROW TAN TO LOOK YELLOW ( ruinned my tan )) STUPID OIL RUINNED MY ORIGINAL NICE HAWAIAN TAN
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m burnt but I’ll be so dark!
customer_reviews.text: So I’m burnt but I know I’ll be dark. I’ll use it but it definitely burnt me. I swim and tan everyday. I’m already two weeks in and tan, I needed a boost, I ordered this, I have not burned at all this year until using this product! But!!!! I know it works because I was BURNING IN THAT SUN!!!! And I’m going to turn so tan! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Manriquez

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I tan soooo slowly normally. Sat out for a bit with this and instantly noticed a difference (though I did burn when I sat out too long the first time...be careful!) Great stuff and definitely notice it works from the very first use!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle & Allison

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Sprays and nicely. It does have a bit of color to it. I haven’t gotten it on my clothes yet but I could see that happening. Love the scent! Would recommend it if you were looking for dark Tan
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Shiny, even and bronze
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it is a light spray, it doesn’t feel heavy on the skin. It applies nicely and evenly. I can not tan to SAVE MY LIFE. So this helps me get to the perfect shade. I highly recommend, but don’t use as sun block because it won’t save you from a sunburnt
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra A

customer_reviews.title: gave me sunburn boils
customer_reviews.text: i’ve never had any skin irritation with tanning oils before this product. my skin is peeling in sheets not flakes. also experienced “second degree sunburn boils” all over my body which has never happened to me before.
customer_reviews.author: aa

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite tanning oils.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite tanning oils. It smells amazing and doesn't leave you greasy after applied. It lasts long and even stays on after you have been in water.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Prentice

customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Australian Gold for years. This was my first bottle of the exotic oil. The smell is phenomenal. Super oily but that’s okay. Gave me a beautiful tan. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Payton Champagne

customer_reviews.title: Tan oil
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and feel and bronzers work well to help with tan
customer_reviews.author: Judy I walters

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly. Can't find any lotions in our stores for months now. Bottle worked fine, and no leaks. I'll comment on the rest after a day at my beach.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: Leaking, took a week to arrive and NO LID (cap)
customer_reviews.text: I just received my package yesterday, and I'm highly disappointed. Not only did it take a week to receive it, but it came with NO LID (cap) for it, and it was leaking. So, I not only lost some of the product due to it leaking, but I also cannot SPRAY it on myself because it has NO LID (cap). What the heck? I'm so disappointed. Am I the only one who received their package in this condition? So unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: D72

customer_reviews.title: Definitely gets the job done! My friends and I all got more tan while using it for sure
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! This tanning oil is a God! It leaves no gross residue, it’s not oily, it’s a dry oil! And I got way more tan when I used it! And then I lost it a few days later and I’m so sad ha ha! I would definitely order again and all my friends used it and loved it as well! Maybe one of them stole it ha ha
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: My fav spray to use every day all day
customer_reviews.text: Use this every day when suns out my guns are out tanning. Best results ever with this. Floating in the pool. Use it. Mowing the yard. Use it. Working in the gardens. Use it. Wash the car. Use it. In other words. When u walk outside. Use it. All day every sunny day.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Too sticky
customer_reviews.text: First at all this has an amazing smell, but the consistency of the oil is terrible, it’s so sticky and leaves the skin so uncomfortable that you don’t want to use it anymore. Also after that your hands stays sticky too, personally I don’t recommend it at all. The price is according the market so it’s okay, but definitely not worthy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Damary paez Mandiola

customer_reviews.title: Tan oil No SPF
customer_reviews.text: Spray sun tan oil for in the sun tanning. No SPF
customer_reviews.author: Jason K

customer_reviews.title: It was not for me .
customer_reviews.text: If you are one of those people who do not like or really really thick greasy feeling on your skin this product would not be for you just like me
customer_reviews.author: tina ganemian

customer_reviews.title: I love Australian Gold.... Its my favorite SPF
customer_reviews.text: Ships on time Packaging great Love the product. Its one of my favorite. Great offer by the seller. Spray applies evenly with no clogs. Works great for bronzing.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Should indicate NO SUNSCREEN
customer_reviews.text: I didnt realize this one had no sunscreen in it. I always purchase this brand with bronzer and sunscreen, cant use it due to no sunscreen😥
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Puts on fast color that's natural looking. No orange color but also not that fake looking chocolate brown from too much bronzer. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jada Payne

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! It works without sunlight, but works even better with. Only have used it twice outside and I already have a flip flop tan line and it’s not even summer yet! Plus you can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: korie

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have used it for many years. I do ask that you use caution when opening the package. The one I received, the cap was not on all the way and a good amount of the bronzer was in the bottom of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsi Pack

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I used this multiple times at the beach and did not burn as i usually do. Smells great and natural. A bit oily but not greasy. Easy squirt and a lock ok the cap. I recommend this, great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J&V

customer_reviews.title: Nice color. Not waterproof. No SPF
customer_reviews.text: It becomes sticky after you apply but then it dries off. It gave me a really nice color. But note that this does not have SPF in it. And it is not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottle was broken and it exploded
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this item the tanning lotion bottle had exploded in the bag, the nozzle was broken and it was very hard to clean off. The lotion itself is great. I burn very easily and haven’t had any issue when apply after a light spray of sunscreen underneath the tanning lotion. It smells great but the bottle is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Sinnema

customer_reviews.title: Stinky Bronze
customer_reviews.text: Although it did help with my tanning my cheeks the consistency is runny and the sent is funky. It is rated as one of the better bronzers and the price isn't bad. I really just dnt like the cheap sent and how it makes my skin feel after I apply it.
customer_reviews.author: J.G

customer_reviews.title: Expect to rub it in, value is good though
customer_reviews.text: You do have to rub it around, it doesn’t spray/mist evenly. It is a tad bit sticky too... It seems to work though & the price is nice
customer_reviews.author: Liz Pineda

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. Use it almost everyday since I live in Florida :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick and Sticky
customer_reviews.text: This isn't like other dry oils.It is very thick and sticky. To me it smells like old bananas. I would t purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nanette

customer_reviews.title: Watch the way they ship this
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion but it arrived in horrible shape. The bubble envelope was smashed and when I opened it there was lotion everywhere. Total mess! Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sooze

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the spray quality
customer_reviews.text: I am not giving a good review because it did not spray well. It comes out in squirts which is hard to manage and wasteful.
customer_reviews.author: Ship

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I think it works well I’m very pale so I had to do it 4-5 times this week to tan. But also I did it on cloudy days and still tanned. Definitely put on SPF before using.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tan
customer_reviews.text: I only use Australian Gold on my skin. It's definitely the best moisturizing oil with an incredible scent. I get the darkest tan with this product
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie Pizzullo

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is great. I just wanted a hint of help with tanning so I got this. Smells great and it’s moisturizing
customer_reviews.author: Casey Austin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t give the required tan
customer_reviews.text: It’s not giving me the expected color. Though it has good texture , not greasy on the body, it immediately dries on my skin. Good smell
customer_reviews.author: Ara

customer_reviews.title: Not oily!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell, prevented sunburn and feels good on skin and not oily. Recommend for laying out in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: kerstin rennie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful accelerator!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I’ve tried more expensive accelerators, and this one beats them hands down!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi T

customer_reviews.title: Reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Works really well and smells great! Isnt super oily and yet still works after floating and swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn P

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay? I guess it's sort of unnecessary. I wasn't so impressed with this that I'd buy again. Put it that way.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kaiserin

customer_reviews.title: Great product but leaked during shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and not greasy what so ever like the others. Unfortunately it must have come open during shipping because I received a mess. About 1/4 of the bottle had leaked out by the time it got to me. I would buy this product again but feel it's a bit expensive. Especially if it comes open during transit.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Groff

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and works
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, not oily and helps advance tanning process with darker deeper color. I wouldn't suggest using it every day but to help advanve the tan to deeper darker color works great
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Budget Friendly
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a lotion/oil for a good price, this is it. In my opinion its better than what most tanning beds will sell you.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L. Tinsley

customer_reviews.title: Tropical paradise
customer_reviews.text: Love the coconut scent and moisturizing affect. Favorite among the teenage daughters.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Is hard for me to get a tan but this stuff did it for me!! Works good!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura T

customer_reviews.title: Best scent guaranteed
customer_reviews.text: Buy this for no other reason other than scent. Best smelling cream I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Nordstrom

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like at all
customer_reviews.text: Have to keep applying, doesn't really do anything? Wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have never been so tan!! I love that it doesn’t leave you all greasy and gross! It dries nicely and leaves your skin feeling and smelling great!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Does smell nice
customer_reviews.text: I was dissatisfied in this I was under the impression this was a spray I can apply and can get and instant or gradual tan but one time use and didn’t see any change at all . Maybe I’m using it wrong ? The smell is nice .. but kinda sad about the color .
customer_reviews.author: Cici

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: Iove this product but I'm giving this one star because when I received it the product spilled out all over the inside bag and box. I tried to get them to replace it and they did but I was told I could through it away amazon told me I could through it away so I did but now I have they are saying I need to return the product I through away.
customer_reviews.author: Chekeyra

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I have very fair skin and this stuff makes my skin glow I love it. I have always had troubles a self tanning or tanning lotion to help give me the best tan I am looking for this stuff does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Frost

customer_reviews.title: It’s a really good lotion and will get you a nice pecan tan ;)
customer_reviews.text: This is great lotion, I know from past experience of using it when it was much easier to find in stores. Provides a wonderful moisturizing tan. Came in two separate bags, one sealed closed and the other open where the lotion leaked out from the sprayer not being screwed on bottle tight well which was a mess. Thankful for ordering two bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Darkens your tan
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for when you already have a tan. It darkens what you have and your tan doesn't fade so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Bohman

customer_reviews.title: Let the tan begin
customer_reviews.text: I am hoping this works as good as it is supposed too
customer_reviews.author: JoLyn

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Can be a bit oily for some. But it works great
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!!!!!!!! I love this one! Amazing in my skin 💖💖
customer_reviews.author: NathaliaMesk

customer_reviews.title: so doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Showed up broken decided to work with it and it SUCKS!!! DONT WAIST YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not to greasy
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good My niece took it over and loves it
customer_reviews.author: Rod G.

customer_reviews.title: Great tanning oil
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to achieve a nice tan! And it smells amazing
customer_reviews.author: Mary

product_meta.title: Australian Gold Dark Tanning Exotic Oil Spray, 8 Ounce | Carrot Extract Formula
product_meta.description: Scent Name:Dark Tanning Exotic Oil Spray| Size:8 Fl OzInspired by Australian sun worshippers, supplies your skin with the natural vitamins. Nutrients and enzymes it needs for the darkest tan nature will allow. Spray- SPF 0 This easily absorbed, non-greasy formula. Premium oils help condition and moisturize the skin.
feature_bullets: Native Australian Acacia Extract provides antioxidant benefits
Product images feature new packaging, packaging of products shipped may vary
